    • Method Detail

      • loadProperties

        public static void loadProperties(InputStream is,
                                  Map m)
        Load the properties from the stream and place them into the given Map as a single level. So as not to clash with the Inq path form, the period character '.' is converted into '_'. Thus a Java property of path.separator becomes path_separator
        Parameters:
        is -
        m -
